title: New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park: Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations     Reservations                Reservations                    Organizing a group visit or field trip to New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park? Start your planning by completing a group reservation request.               Group Reservations      If you are bringing a group of 10 or more or planning a field trip, please complete a group reservation request form. Group Reservation Request Form A minimum of two weeks advance notice is requested. Inquires may also be directed to Rufai Shardow, Visitor Experience Specialist at 508-996-4095 ext 6106. For more information about school group reservations click here.
